name: InfecundNotForContraceptiveReasonsICD10PCSProcedures
title: Infecund Not for Contraceptive Reasons ICD10PCS Procedures
description: This set of values contains procedure codes related to infecundity or sterility for non-contraceptive reasons (e.g., hysterectomy, oophorectomy, unilateral salpingectomy or tubal occlusion).
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Family Planning - provision of most and moderately effective contraceptive methods),(Data Element Scope: Procedure codes indicating infecundity or sterility for non-contraceptive reasons (e.g., hysterectomy, bilateral oophorectomy).),(Inclusion Criteria: Procedure codes indicating infecundity or sterility for non-contraceptive reasons (e.g., hysterectomy, bilateral oophorectomy).),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes female sterilization procedures (e.g., bilateral tubal occlusion, bilateral salpingectomy).)
